subject: Invoice for Stokes Cabin
body:
Hello Frank Thomas,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Stokes Cabin): for a total of $283.00. The work took place between Sep 16, 2022 and Nov 01, 2022.

Details


Stokes Cabin: 1 invoice totaling $283.00


Invoice #7 for $283.00
Days Worked
Sep 16, 2022 3hr 54min,
Sep 29, 2022 5hr 18min,
Oct 11, 2022 5hr 9min,
Oct 31, 2022 1hr 0min,
Nov 01, 2022 3hr 31min


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $283.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Construction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
